slide.title: Abahani's Mushfiqur Rahim (L) and Mahmudullah Riyad toast a single on way to their victory over Mohammedan in the Victory Day T20 Cup in Sylhet on Monday. Photo: Star

Country's top all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan (R) came to the party for Prime Bank only yesterday after missing the opening day's game, and right away won the battle against UCB BCB XI's Tamim Iqbal. Photo: Star
